snippet.title: Skynet Rising: Portal to the Past - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
This October 2016, Skynet Rising: Portal to the Past is coming to Steam Early Access.

After the fall of Mankind, the survivors of Afterearth had started living in remote groups. Key elements of survival such as food, ammunition, intel and women became rare commodities. The lawless lands gave birth to scavengers. Armed robbers gave themselves fancy names and became pirates of the wasteland. Once welcoming green earth was no place for the weak. They perished quickly. Some survived by going to extreme measures, living on corpses and biohazard waste. From the ashes of the downfall, new breed of deadly creatures evolved. The new world order incubated different forms of life. Human survivors had to stay on the run. Everyone wanted out, and that became the purpose of life for what’s left of living Mankind.
